evidences.text: Out swing deliveries are the ones that move away from the batsman. While the in swing bowling is bowled with the intention of hitting the stumps or getting a batsman out LBW, an out swing delivery is bowled by the bowler often to set up a batsman for an in swing delivery. By bowling a few out swing deliveries, a batsman may think that the next delivery is also going to go away from him. However, the bowler then chooses to bowl and in swing delivery and get the batsman out.

evidences.text: The Transformation of Wipro In 1945, Muhammed Hashim Premji incorporated Western Indian Vegetable Products Ltd, a company that initially focused on manufacturing cooking oil and laundry soap. However, in 1966, upon the sudden demise of his father, Azim Premji, then a 21-year-old student at Stanford University , returned to India to take charge of Wipro. Under Azim Premji's leadership, Wipro underwent a transformation from a company primarily involved in manufacturing hydrogenated oil to a diversified conglomerate. It expanded into bakery fats, toiletries, hair care products, lighting products, and hydraulic cylinders and eventually entered the high-technology sector by manufacturing minicomputers.

The park shelters four of the world's threatened species of mammals (snow leopard, serow, the Himalayan tahr and musk deer) and three of the world's threatened bird species (Western tragopan, koklass, cheer pheasants). A large part of the park's green cover is composed of three varieties of oak – ban, mohru and kharsu.

evidences.text: The term bhangra originally designated a particular dance performed by Sikh and Muslim men in the farming districts of the Punjab region of South Asia. In a typical performance, several dancers executed vigorous kicks, leaps, and bends of the body to the accompaniment of short songs called boliyan and, most significantly, to the beat of a dhol (double-headed drum).
